title: 第三法則ハブ
content:
[!--
第三法則CSSテーマです。
--]

[[module CSS]]
@import url(https://scp-jp.github.io/files/theme/3law/style0.css);
[[/module]]

[!--
ここからのコードでハブ独自のCSSを設定してます。
--]

[[module CSS]]
.hub-window {
    border: solid 5px #999999;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.window-discord {
    margin-left: 25%;
    margin-right: 25%;
    padding: 0px;
}
.window-latest {
    margin-left: 12.5%;
    margin-right: 12.5%;
    padding: 0px;
}
.hub-quote-box {
    border: solid 2px #000000;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-left: 12.5%;
    margin-right: 12.5%;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.hub-quote-box p {
    margin-top: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
}
.hub-credit-box {
    border-bottom: solid 2px #000000;
    margin-left: 7.5%;
    margin-right: 7.5%;
}
.hub-box {
    border: solid 5px #999999;
    background:#fffbfe;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.hub-box-collapsible a.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #315B7D;
    font-size: 175%;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Trebuchet, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
.window-box {
}
.window-infobox {
}
.window-box-line {
    border-top: solid 2px #000000;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.window-box-list ul li {
    padding-top: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
}
.window-box-collapsible a.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #315B7D;
    font-size: 140%;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Trebuchet, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
[[/module]]

[!--
Crom searche用隠し画像。
--]

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme%3A3law/PL_3Law_Logo_2.png
|caption=知識は力なり
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[!--
疑似的な親ページ設定(下流に伝搬しないように)と、評価モジュールの整列。
--]

[[table style="width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; vertical-align: top"]]
[[[Canon Hub|]]] >> 第三法則ハブ
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right"]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[!--
Discordへのリンクボックス。
--]
[[# discord]]
[[div class="hub-window window-discord"]]
[[=]]
+ [https://discord.gg/EG3DGUcuDM 私達のDiscordに参加しませんか？](英語版)
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[!--
最新の作品ボックス。ENでは手動だが、JPでは自動取得。
--]

[[# latest]]
[[div class="hub-window window-latest"]]
[[=]]
+ 最近の投稿
[[/=]]

[[module ListPages tags="第三法則 -hub" separate="no" order="created_at desc" limit="5"]]
[[span style="margin-left: 20%"]]**%%title_linked%%** by //%%created_by%%//[[/span]]
[[/module]]


[[/div]]

[!--
ランダム記事ボックス。未完成。

[[# random]]
[[div class="hub-box hub-box-collapsible"]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="Random Article" hide="Close Preview" hideLocation="top"]]
[[/=]]

----

[[module ListPages category="*" wrapper="no" separate="no" tags="third-law -hub" limit="1" order="random"]]

[[head]]
[[/head]]

[[body]]
+ %%title%%
++++ By %%created_by%%

----

[[<]]
%%content{4}%%
[[/<]]

[[>]]
[[[%%link%%|Continue reading]]]
[[/>]]

[[/body]]

[[foot]]
[[/foot]]
[[/module]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[/div]]
--]


[!--
フラグメントページのリスト
上のナビゲーション
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-hub-0 [ホーム]

シリーズリスト
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-0 [7OW]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-1 [PNM]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-2 [サムサラ]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-3 [異常事件簿]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-4 [お金持ちの世界]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-5 [向けられた銃]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-6 [スピードデーモン]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-7 [機械の零落]
https://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:third-law-hub-series-8 [ダモクレス]
--]

[!--
ハブウィンドウのコンテンツを取得するためのListPage
--]

[[module ListPages wrapper="no" separate="no" category="fragment" name="@URL|third-law-hub-hub-*" parent="." limit="@URL|1" order="@URL|name" offset="@URL|0"]]

[[head]]
[[# window]]
[[div class="hub-window"]]
= << [[[/third-law-hub#window|ホーム]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/1#window|初心者向け]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/2#window|世界観構築]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/3#window|単品作品]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-series-*/limit/20/order/random#window|シリーズもの]]] | _
| [[[/third-law-hub/offset/4#window|ベストセレクション]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/5#window|時系列順]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/offset/6#window|投稿日順]]] |  [[[/third-law-hub/offset/7#window|コレクション]]] >>
[[/head]]

[[body]]
[[div class="hub-box"]]
%%content%%
[[/div]]

[[/body]]

[[foot]]
= << [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/0#window|投稿する]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/1#window|連続性]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/2#window|歴史]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/3#window|年表]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/4#window|用語集]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/5#window|団体]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/6#window|領域]]] | [[[/third-law-hub/name/third-law-hub-info-*/offset/7#window|人物]]] >>
[[/div]]

[[/foot]]

[[/module]]

[!--
クレジットボックス
--]
[[# credits]]
[[div class="hub-box hub-box-collapsible window-box-list"]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="クレジット" hide="クレジットを閉じる" hideLocation="top"]]
[[/=]]

----

[[=]]
+++ 貢献者
カノンに貢献した著者と編集者。彼らは新しい記事に対するグリーンライトの権限を持ちます。
[[/=]]

[[div class="hub-credit-box" style="border-top: solid 2px #000000;"]]
**[[[greenwolf-s-author-page|GreenWolf]]]**
//"帽子の監督"//
@<著者・MTFコンテスト(タウ-5 "サムサラ")・終末の日コンテスト(第七次オカルト大戦)・部門コンテスト(ダモクレス・イニシアチブ)>@
[[/div]]

[[div class="hub-credit-box"]]

----

[[=]]
+++ 貢献した芸術家
カノンでの使用のために作品を描いてくれた芸術家。
[[/=]]

[[div class="hub-credit-box" style="border-top: solid 2px #000000;"]]
